name: hexamobileshare-monorepo
description: hexaMobileShare - Comprehensive Flutter Mobile Kit Monorepo

scripts.postinstall: dart pub global activate melos && dart pub global run melos bootstrap
scripts.bootstrap: dart pub global run melos bootstrap
scripts.clean: dart pub global run melos clean
scripts.analyze: dart pub global run melos run analyze
scripts.format: dart pub global run melos run format
scripts.test: dart pub global run melos run test
scripts.widgetbook:generate: dart pub global run melos exec --scope="widgetbook_kit" -- flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.widgetbook:watch: dart pub global run melos exec --scope="widgetbook_kit" -- flutter pub run build_runner watch --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.widgetbook:web: pnpm widgetbook:generate && dart pub global run melos exec --scope="widgetbook_kit" -- flutter run -d chrome
scripts.widgetbook:build: pnpm widgetbook:generate && dart pub global run melos exec --scope="widgetbook_kit" -- flutter build web

author: hexaTune LLC
